channel.title: Need help makeing theiving stalls random!
channel.description: hi my source is deltascape, i wanna make a chest where u click on and you can get like any random item, i got no idea anyone know how?

item.title: Need help makeing theiving stalls random!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

No, we donâ€™t want to code for you.
The random(int) method in the Misc class returns a random integer between 0 and the parameter. Use that in combination with the addItem method.
